The new release brings an updated visual interface thatâ€™s still distinctly Nothing alongside a slew of minor changes, including a reimagined lock screen. items.title: US Solheim Cup-winning captain Lewis to retire
items.summary: Stacy Lewis, the captain of the United States' 2024 Solheim Cup-winning team, says she will retire from golf at the end of the LPGA season.

items.summary: Gamers have put millions of hours into DOOM in the 32 years since its launch, but it's unlikely that many of them have left the game running for upwards of two years straight. At least one person did, though, and the result is... that it crashed.

items.title: Mandhana ton leads India to big win over Australia
items.summary: Smriti Mandhana scores a brilliant hundred as India claim a thumping 102-run win over Australia to level the one-day international series.

items.title: Wightman's commentator father proud at 1500m silver

items.title: Intel Arc A750 prototype spotted with 16GB VRAM â€” Engineering sample made by Gunnir sports sticker claiming a 512-bit memory bus

It also has dual 8-pin power connectors and somehow a 512-bit memory bus. The prototype is made by Gunnir and it works when connected to a computer, just like any oâ€¦

items.title: Engineer creates â€˜blazingly fastâ€™ web server powered by a disposable vape â€” 'VapeServer' powered by 24 MHz Arm chip with 24 kilobytes of flash, 3KB of SRAM
items.summary: Engineer and origami artist Bogdan Ionescu has created a web server that runs on a disposable vape.

items.title: Expect HDD, SSD shortages as AI rewrites the rules of storage hierarchy â€” multiple companies announce price hikes, too
items.summary: The computing market is absolutely ablaze with growth, and what's driving it is AI, of course. The most common headlines on this topic tend to revolve around GPUs, but the storage market is under heavy pressure as well â€” especially hard drive vendors who purportedly haven't done much to increase maâ€¦

items.title: Samsung's 4TB 990 Evo Plus SSD drops to a new all-time low of 5 cents per gigabyte â€” speedy and spacious drive drops to $199 at B&H
